actions.text: Amendment SA 789 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 789 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bunning. (consideration:  CR S6899-6900; text as modified:  CR S6899-6900) To express the sense of the Senate on the deployment of airborne chemical agent monitoring systems at the chemical stockpile disposal sites in the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 789 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 789 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bunning.

purpose: To express the sense of the Senate on the deployment of airborne chemical agent monitoring systems at the chemical stockpile disposal sites in the United States.
